content.raw: I have a question about this deprecation in [gazebo pull request 1568](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/pull-request/1568/fix-warnings-when-using-sdformat-302/diff). As a static public variable, it was writable, and the `gz` tool was writing to it. I don't know if that should be allowed. We are currently getting deprecation warnings for trying to write to it, and I don't know what to do instead.
content.html: I have a question about this deprecation in gazebo pull request 1568. As a static public variable, it was writable, and the gz tool was writing to it. I don't know if that should be allowed. We are currently getting deprecation warnings for trying to write to it, and I don't know what to do instead.
